text: David ga heeu gi nia daangada ala i dono baahi, “Dehee di hui o tangada dela ma ga daaligi taane Philistia deenei, dela ga haga dagaloaha digau Israel gi daha mo di hagalangaadia deenei? Gei di ma koai deenei dela taane bouli dongoeho dela bolo ia e mee di hai baahi gi di buini dauwa o di God mouli dee odi?”
